job.title: Senior Software Engineer and Team Leader (1308)
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout The PositionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are looking for an experienced fullstack software engineer to join our software development team with experience designing building and scaling microservices in a cloud environment Youll be working with a team of software engineers to create microservices in AWS making thousands of Single Digits networks more userfriendly reliable and scalable You will follow Agile DevOps processes build exciting new features and deliver those features using our automated CICD process Engineers in this position must either have experience with the networking industry or be quick to learn new skillsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRoles And Responsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtDesign and develop reliable and scalable microservices in AWS using Java Reactjs Docker and AWS platform technologiesltligt ltligtDesign and implement REST APIs using OpenAPIltligt ltligtLead a team of software engineers using Agile DevOps processes and proceduresltligt ltligtCollaborate with customers and functional experts to understand technical requirements and provide innovative solutionsltligt ltligtOther duties as assignedltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt57 years of experience with building scalable eventbased microservices with Java and AWS platform services such as EventBridgeltligt ltligtExperience with DevOps processes in AWS including EKS and Terraformltligt ltligtExperience with SQL using AWS RDS as well as NoSQL using DynamoDBltligt ltligt13 years of team leadershipltligt ltligtWorking knowledge of the networking industry is preferred including familiarity with networking protocols such as TCPIP and SNMP as well as experience with access points switches and firewallsltligt ltligtScrum master certification preferredltligtltulgt
